A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie had no purpose! I’m so disappointed. They create problems just so the characters have something to do which creates other sub plots that fizzle out to nothing. It took Luke days of training and hard work to make a rock float but now Rey can lift a whole mountain side? Come on!! And now the sniveling apprentice who needs much training is the supreme leader? Why did they even bother putting Snoke in this series in the first place? And don’t get me started on Leia doing the Peter Pan flight through space! There are so many problems with this movie I could go on and on. Rogue one is still the best!!!
